Name: Semantic Icon
Description: An icon is a glyph used to represent another concept more simply

Definitions.Disabled: An icon can show that it is disabled
Definitions.Size: An icon can vary in size
Definitions.Link: An icon can be formatted as a link
Definitions.Circular: An icon can be formatted to appear circular
Definitions.Square: An icon can be formatted to appear square
Definitions.Colors: An icon can be formatted with different colors
Definitions.Inverted: an icon can have its colors inverted for contrast
